Articles.Content:
I have put my craft from previous update to my career mode save.

It's saves from august is my best design so far. I made in it Kerballed flyby around EVE and back.

I did not want built my craft from scratch. It work a ok on sandbox. Does is any add-on that tell my witch technology i must unlock to make use my craft?

You can look up the tech that is needed in the part.cfg file you are using, and can even change it there. Look for the line: TechRequired =

Example:

PART
{
name = orbitalorb
module = Part
author = Porkjet

mesh = model.mu
scale = 1
rescaleFactor = 1

node_stack_top = 0.0, 1.18, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0
node_stack_bottom = 0.0, -1.18, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0


[B]TechRequired = specializedConstruction[/B]
entryCost = 3000
cost = 1500
category = Pods
subcategory = 0
title = TMA-1 Orbital Orb

Just open the part.cfg file of the mod you want to use with any text editor (e.g. notepad)
